at0000.1.description: A generic section header which should be renamed in a template to suit a specific clinical context.
Un encabezado de sección de tipo genérico que será renombrado en una plantilla para su empleo en un contexto clínico específico.
En generisk seksjonsoverskrift som skal gis nytt navn i en templat for å passe i en gitt klinisk kontekst.
Um cabeçalho de sessão genérico que deve ser renomeado no template para adequar-se a um contexto clínico específico.
En allmän avsnittsrubrik som döps om i en openEHR-mall för att passa in i en specifik klinisk kontext.
Eine generische Abschnittsüberschrift eines Templates, welche entsprechend dem spezifischen klinischen Kontext umbenannt werden sollte.
Un'intestazione di sezione generica che dovrebbe essere rinominata in un template per adattarsi ad uno specifico contesto clinico.
Un en-tête de section générique qui doit être renommé dans un modèle pour s'adapter à un contexte clinique spécifique.

fi.purpose: *To record the responses to an individual- or self-reported questionnaire screening about social issues. (en)
fi.use:
*Use to record the responses to an individual- or self-reported questionnaire screening about social issues.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation; or
- Specific questioning related to screening for social determinants of health, including housing and homelessness, social isolation, employment, education, social supports, gambling, safety and exposure to violence.

A specific question to identify homelessness at the time of recording has been added as it is a ubiquitous issue in so many settings.

In order to record the response at a specific point in time or within an interval of time, use the EVENT RM attribute.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening process identifies a social issue and it is intended that the details are to be recorded and persisted as part of an ongoing health record, any further specific details about the social issue should be recorded using archetypes specific for the clinical purpose. (en)
fi.misuse: *Not to be used to record persisent details about a social context-related concepts. For example: housing, education, occupation, social supports and social network. Use specific archetypes for this purpose. (en)

nb.purpose: For å registrere responsen i et spørreskjema om sosiale problemer.
nb.use:
*Use to record the responses to an individual- or self-reported questionnaire screening about social issues.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation; or
- Specific questioning related to screening for social determinants of health, including housing and homelessness, social isolation, employment, education, social supports, gambling, safety and exposure to violence.

A specific question to identify homelessness at the time of recording has been added as it is a ubiquitous issue in so many settings.

In order to record the response at a specific point in time or within an interval of time, use the EVENT RM attribute.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening process identifies a social issue and it is intended that the details are to be recorded and persisted as part of an ongoing health record, any further specific details about the social issue should be recorded using archetypes specific for the clinical purpose. (en)
nb.misuse: Skal ikke brukes til å registrere detaljer om spesifikke sosiale kontekstrelaterte konsepter. For eksempel: bolig, utdanning, yrke, sosial støtte og sosialt nettverk. Bruk spesifikke arketyper for dette formålet.

en.purpose: To record the responses to an individual- or self-reported questionnaire screening about social issues.
en.use:
Use to record the responses to an individual- or self-reported questionnaire screening about social issues.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation; or
- Specific questioning related to screening for social determinants of health, including housing and homelessness, social isolation, employment, education, social supports, gambling, safety and exposure to violence.

A specific question to identify homelessness at the time of recording has been added as it is a ubiquitous issue in so many settings.

In order to record the response at a specific point in time or within an interval of time, use the EVENT RM attribute.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening process identifies a social issue and it is intended that the details are to be recorded and persisted as part of an ongoing health record, any further specific details about the social issue should be recorded using archetypes specific for the clinical purpose.
en.misuse: Not to be used to record persisent details about a social context-related concepts. For example: housing, education, occupation, social supports and social network. Use specific archetypes for this purpose.

at0005.1.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.1.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.1.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

author.name: Marit Alice Venheim, John Tore Valand
author.organisation: Helse Vest IKT AS, Helse Bergen

de.purpose: *To record the responses to a screening questionnaire about self-described issues, worries or concerns for an individual. (en)
de.use:
*Use to record the responses to a screening questionnaire about self-described issues, worries or concerns for an individual.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation; or
- Specific questioning related to aspects of general health and wellbeing, financial and family concerns.

In order to record the response at a specific point in time or within an interval of time, use the EVENT RM attribute.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening process identifies an issue or concern and it is intended that the details are to be recorded and persisted as part of an ongoing health record, any further specific details about the issue should be recorded using the standalone EVALUATION.issue archetype. (en)
de.misuse:
*Not to be used to record details about a specific issue as part of a typical clinical consultation. Use EVALUATION.issue for this purpose.

Not to be used to record details about symptoms or signs. Use CLUSTER.symptom_sign for this purpose. (en)

nb.purpose: For å registrere responsen i et spørreskjema for individuelle problemer eller bekymringer som berører et individ.
nb.use:
Brukes for å registrere responsen i et spørreskjema for individuelle problemer eller bekymringer som berører et individ.

Vanlige bruksområder inkluderer, men er ikke begrenset til:
- Systematisk spørring i enhver konsultasjon; eller
- Spesifikk spørring relatert til overvåkning av infeksjonssykdom.

For å registrere responsen på et spesifikt tidspunkt, eller i et tidsintervall bruk referansemodellens EVENT RM attributt.

Denne arketypen er laget for bruk som et screeningverktøy for å registrere enkle data i et spørreskjema, for eksempel til et sykdomsregister. Oppdager man i screeningprosessen at et individuelt problem eller bekymring er tilstede, bør detaljer om problemet eller bekymringen lagres som en del av den løpende journalen. Bruk da arketypen EVALUATION.issue for å registrere spesifikke detaljer om problemet eller bekymringen.
nb.misuse:
Skal ikke brukes til å registrere detaljer om et spesifikt problem som en del av en typisk klinisk konsultasjon. Bruk arketypen EVALUATION.issue til dette formålet.

Skal ikke brukes til å registrere detaljer om symptomer eller sykdomstegn. Bruk arketypen CLUSTER.symptom_sign til dette formålet.

en.purpose: To record the responses to a screening questionnaire about self-described issues, worries or concerns for an individual.
en.use:
Use to record the responses to a screening questionnaire about self-described issues, worries or concerns for an individual.

Common use cases include, but are not limited to:
- Systematic questioning in any consultation; or
- Specific questioning related to aspects of general health and wellbeing, financial and family concerns.

In order to record the response at a specific point in time or within an interval of time, use the EVENT RM attribute.

This archetype has been designed to be used as a screening tool or to record simple questionnaire-format data for use in situations such as a disease registry. If the screening process identifies an issue or concern and it is intended that the details are to be recorded and persisted as part of an ongoing health record, any further specific details about the issue should be recorded using the standalone EVALUATION.issue archetype.
en.misuse:
Not to be used to record details about a specific issue as part of a typical clinical consultation. Use EVALUATION.issue for this purpose.

Not to be used to record details about symptoms or signs. Use CLUSTER.symptom_sign for this purpose.

author.name: Marit Alice Venheim, Silje Ljosland Bakke, John Tore Valand
author.organisation: Helse Vest IKT, Helse Vest IKT AS, Helse Bergen

at0000.1.description: An individual- or self-reported questionnaire screening for social issues.

at0005.1.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.1.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.1.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.
at0004.1.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0022.2.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.2.text: Saya gelisah, saya tidak dapat diam untuk waktu lama
at0004.2.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.2.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.3.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.3.text: Saya sering sakit kepala, sakit perut atau macam-macam sakit lain
at0004.3.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.3.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.4.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.4.text: Kalau saya memiliki mainan CD atau makanan, saya biasanya berbagi dengan orang lain
at0004.4.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.4.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.5.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.5.text: Saya menjadi sangat marah dan sering tidak bisa mengendalikan kemarahan saya
at0004.5.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.5.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.6.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.6.text: Saya lebih suka sendirian daripada bersama dengan orang-orang yang seumur saya
at0004.6.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.6.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.7.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.7.text: Saya biasanya melakukan apa yang diperintahkan oleh orang lain
at0004.7.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.7.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.8.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.8.text: Saya biasanya merasa cemas atau khawatir terhadap apapun.
at0004.8.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.8.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.9.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.9.text: Saya selalu siap menolong jika ada orang terluka, kecewa atau merasa sakit.
at0004.9.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.9.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.10.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.10.text: Bila saya sedang gelisah atau cemas, badan saya sering bergerak-gerak tanpa saya sadari.
at0004.10.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.10.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.11.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.11.text: Saya mempunyai satu teman baik atau lebih.
at0004.11.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.11.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.12.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.12.text: Saya sering bertengkar dengan orang lain. Saya dapat memaksa orang lain melakukan apa yang saya inginkan.
at0004.12.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.12.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.13.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.13.text: Saya sering merasa tidak bahagia, sedih atau menangis.
at0004.13.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.13.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.14.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.14.text: Orang lain seumur saya pada umumnya menyukai saya.
at0004.14.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.14.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.15.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.15.text: Perhatian saya mudah teralihkan. Saya sulit memusatkan perhatian pada apapun
at0004.15.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.15.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.16.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.16.text: Saya merasa gugup dalam situasi baru. Saya mudah kehilangan rasa percaya diri saya.
at0004.16.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.16.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.17.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.17.text: Saya bersikap baik terhadap anak-anak yang lebih muda dari saya.
at0004.17.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.17.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.18.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.18.text: Saya sering dituduh berbohong atau berbuat curang.
at0004.18.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.18.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.19.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.19.text: Saya sering diganggu atau dipermainkan oleh anak-anak atau remaja lainnya.
at0004.19.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.19.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.20.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.20.text: Saya sering menawarkan diri untuk membantu orang lain (orang tua, guru, anak-anak ).
at0004.20.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.20.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.21.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.21.text: Saya berpikir terlebih dulu akibat yang akan terjadi, sebelum berbuat atau melakukan sesuatu.
at0004.21.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.21.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.22.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.22.text: Saya mengambil barang yang bukan milik saya dari rumah, sekolah atau dari mana saja.
at0004.22.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.22.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.23.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.23.text: Saya lebih mudah berteman dengan orang dewasa daripada dengan orang seusia Saya.
at0004.23.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.23.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.24.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.24.text: Banyak yang saya takuti, saya mudah menjadi takut.
at0004.24.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.24.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.

at0022.25.description: Screening details about a specifed social issue.

at0004.25.text: Saya menyelesaikan pekerjaan yang sedang saya lakukan. Saya mempunyai perhatian yang baik terhadap apapun.
at0004.25.comment: For example: food insecurity; or experience of domestic violence.

at0005.25.text: Saya berusaha bersikap baik kepada orang lain. Saya peduli dengan perasaan mereka.
